name: Bug Eater
description: Bug eater is a tongue-shooter arcade game in which the players take on the role of a frog who is being attacked by bugs. To survive, you'll have to eat down your opponents or blow them away with your powerful croaks! The endless mode pits you against an endless supply of bugs. How long can you survive and most importantly, how much can you eat? Be sure to post the screenshots of your high scores in the comments and also your views on the game.
